== Roopa (610636) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Roopa is a village in the [[Pavagada ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 939.71 hectares and harbouring 753 households with total population of 3174 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Pavagada]] is at a distance of 1 km. Male population is 1584 and female population is 1590. Scheduled Caste Population is 1208 and Scheduled Tribes population is 43. Census Location Code of the village is 610636<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
